boardgame.name: XenoShyft: Dreadmire
boardgame.description: You survived the horrors of the Hive _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; now venture onto the new world of Genesis VII, a lush but deadly marsh planet featuring an entirely new ecosystem of horrors to overcome._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;XenoShyft: Dreadmire, which can be played as a standalone game or mixed with assets from XenoShyft: Onslaught, brings a new XenoShyft experience to your tabletop, with eight new troop types, 20 new item types, and more than 40 fearsome new enemy types._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The XenoShyft game system combines classic deck-building and resource management with fast-paced combat and unique _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;base defense_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; elements. As the game progresses, each player builds up their deck of troop and item cards, which they will in turn use to defend the base against incoming enemies in deadly combat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Cool Mini Or Not Promo Pack 2016
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Cult of the New Board Game Podcast Episode 011 – Blood Rage vs El Grande
The Game Pit Podcast - Episode 57: The Fury of Dracula 3rd Edition and more...

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: This sale is for my Kickstarter pledge of $60 for the base game. Upon receipt of payment, I will transfer ownership of the pledge to you via the pledge manager and send you confirmation that the recipient name and shipping address has been changed.

***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** Xenoshyft: Dreamier is expected to ship in Q4, 2016 This is for the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Bring on the Brood!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; pledge level, which includes the game and all stretch goals (including KS Exclusives) Shipping to be determined when the game arrives from the publisher, but based on previous CMON projects, this package will likely weigh about 9 pounds (4 kg). In addition to the standard pledge, we have a number of separate paid add-ons available: Premium Folding Lane Boards Source Book Xenoshyft Immolation 5-6 Players Add-on Pack NorTec Elite Forbidden Sciences Expansion Please contact us for pricing.

Brand new kickstarter funded boardgame, tried it out but it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s not really my thing. Condition is used, but as new. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve sorted the cards using dividers, some card packs still in original wrapping. Includes all the kickstarter exclusives in the first image, and the optional addons I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve circled in the second image. Most of the stuff fits inside the main box as pictured. Direct bank transfer is an option. Buyer is responsible for all postage fees, and paypal fees that apply. I will try to ship using the cheapest method available to me, with tracking and insurance. Alternatively if anyone lives in Adelaide, you can contact me for a pickup purchase at Largs North 5016

Bring on the Brood! - XenoShyft: Dreadmire core box + Kickstarter exclusive Corpse Puppeteer Boss cards + Kickstarter exclusive Resources play mat + all applicable stretch goals. This is the kickstarter edition of the game, which includes all of the extras listed above. For more information regarding what kickstarter exclusives come with the game, please visit- https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/cmon/xenoshyft-dreadmire The core game is opened and played once. It is in perfect condition. The two expansion boxes, which include the kickstarter exclusives, that came with the game are brand new and have not been opened. I will ship via FedEx Ground with tracking and insurance for a flat $8 to continental USA addresses. If you live on a military base, Hawaii, Alaska, or overseas, please contact me for a shipping quote first.

Kickstarter edition with many optional buys, will include: Xenoshyft: Dreadmire Resource Mat Brood Expansion Kickstarter Exclusive Card Pack Xenoshyft: Immolation Expansion Kickstarter Exclusive Immolation Cards Forbidden Sciences Expansion Kickstarter Exclusive Forbidden Sciences Cards All new in shrink EXCEPT Immolation, which did not come in shrink. Cards are still sealed Shipping $25 in the US, to include insurance for final amount. Will ship internationally but insured cost will be prohibitive Local pickup in Lexington available, or Louisville/Cincy if patient Please GM me with any questions, I will be happy to combine shipping on any item in my marketplace, OR with any item on my trade list if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to make an offer. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll also discount t each item 10% on multiple purchase, I REALLY need the space! All sales will go through BGG marketplace. Payment via paypal only Reserves for Raxximus

The box was opened, card packs opened, and I played partway through a game by myself to learn how to play after reading the rule book. The reason I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling is because I bought it as game to play by myself -- the people I play with wouldn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t really be into. Well, it wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t that great as a solo game, so I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling it. This is the Kickstarter edition with all the extra stuff from the base pledge. I paid $15 extra for one add-on, which was the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;four premium folding lane boards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; They are nice, but they make the box not quite close. See attached pictures. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to recoup what I paid for it, which was $75. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s still in perfect condition, I basically just unwrapped the card packs for you. The cards are pretty well secured in the box so they should travel well. The extra card packs have not been opened at all. Very mild shelf wear to box, as in pictures. Will ship by FedEx, buyer to pay actual cost. I have a business account there so FedEx is my most affordable option typically.

This is for the full Kickstarter version including the neoprene mat. It also includes the 5-6 player expansion, premium folding player boards, Forbidden Sciences, Nortec-Elite, and Immolation optional buys. All items will ship in the base game box. I will pay shipping to the USA. Let me know if you also want the Immolation box but that will require a shipping charge due to size. Kickstarter page: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/cmon/xenoshyft-dreadmire See https://boardgamegeek.com/filepage/141530/xenoshyft-dreadmire-kickstarter-checklist for a card list.

Item: Xenoshyft: Dreadmire (Kickstarter edition) Condition: Opened but unplayed (cards still in shrink wrap) from a smoke-free and pet-free home. Dreadmire includes: - Base game - All Kickstarter stretch goals (over 125 additional cards, resource playmat) - All cards still in shrink wrap - Card storage box to hold all cards This item can be purchased with my listing of Xenoshyft: Onslaught (https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/product/1271536) for a $10 discount overall and to save on shipping. Onslaught includes the following: - Base game - Psychogenics Lab Expansion (retail version) - Hive Expansion (retail version) - Mayday Games Standard 63.5x88mm Card sleeves (all cards are sleeved) - Card storage box to hold all cards PLEASE READ BEFORE PURCHASING: Send me a GeekMail message before you purchase Onslaught, Dreadmire, or both. We will need to figure out various logistics, such as: - Do you want the insert that the game came with? (I removed the one from the Onslaught box, though I still have it if needed.) - Do you want both game boxes if purchasing Onslaught and Dreadmire? (Both Onslaught and Dreadmire are stored in the Onslaught box now, though each is separated into individual card storage boxes.) - Do you want to keep the card sleeves for the Onslaught cards? - Calculate shipping rates for individual vs. combined purchase -------- Do you want to buy Dreadmire only (with all Kickstarter stretch goals)? If so, this section applies to you. - Item dimensions: 12 x 12 x 4 - Shipping dimensions: 16 1/8 x 12 1/8 x 5 1/4 - Shipping weight: 6 pounds Here are estimated shipping costs for Dreadmire only: UPS Ground: - To 10011 (New York, NY): $19.06 - To 75201 (Dallas, TX): $15.98 - To 94110 (San Francisco, CA): $12.09 USPS: - To 10011 (New York, NY): $24.19 (Ground) or $25.25 (Priority Mail 2-Day) - To 75201 (Dallas, TX): $17.50 (Ground) - To 94110 (San Francisco, CA): $12.50 (Priority Mail 2-Day) ------- Do you want to buy Onslaught and Dreadmire but want them combined into a single game box? Read this section. Item dimensions: 12 x 12 x 4 Shipping dimensions: 16 1/8 x 12 1/8 x 5 1/4 Shipping weight: 11 pounds UPS Ground: - To 10011 (New York, NY): $24.72 - To 75201 (Dallas, TX): $19.81 - To 94110 (San Francisco, CA): $13.15 USPS: - To 10011 (New York, NY): $39.28 (Ground) or $42.35 (Priority Mail 2-Day) - To 75201 (Dallas, TX): $26.21 (Ground) - To 94110 (San Francisco, CA): $19.75 (Priority Mail 2-Day) -------- Do you want to buy Onslaught and Dreadmire together AND want both game boxes? Read this section. Item dimensions: 12 x 12 x 4 and 12 x 12 x 4 Shipping dimensions: 14 x 14 x 8 Shipping weight: 11 pounds UPS Ground: - To 10011 (New York, NY): $24.72 - To 75201 (Dallas, TX): $19.81 - To 94110 (San Francisco, CA): $13.15 USPS: - To 10011 (New York, NY): $39.28 (Ground) or $42.35 (Priority Mail 2-Day) - To 75201 (Dallas, TX): $26.21 (Ground) - To 94110 (San Francisco, CA): $19.75 (Priority Mail 2-Day) (Yes, the shipping cost to have both game boxes is the same as combining Onslaught and Dreadmire into a single game box.)
